short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add right click menu option: search highlighted text in incognito

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
After highlighting text, right click on it.

This extension will add a new option in the right-click menu for you to search that specific text in Incognito mode.
